quote: Nothing fortified me, and simple loneliness all but destroyed me, yet I felt swamped by the belief that life must mean something- otherwise why was it there? Why was anything anything?
quote_letters: NOTHING FORTIFIED ME AND SIMPLE LONELINESS ALL BUT DESTROYED ME YET I FELT SWAMPED BY THE BELIEF THAT LIFE MUST MEAN SOMETHING- OTHERWISE WHY WAS IT THERE WHY WAS ANYTHING ANYTHING
